game.name: Animals Memory: Dinosaurs
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Animals Memory: Dinosaurs is a card game with pictures of different dinosaurs that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Animals Memory: Dinosaurs is a card game with pictures of different dinosaurs that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards.

reviewHighlights.text: 52개의 도전과제, 완전정복 달성 가능 스테이지 전부 클리어 도전과제가 없으므로 1번 스테이지만 52번 반복하면 도전과제 전부 달성가능
